## SetStateAction type

New state to set to a channel, or a callback function that will produce the new state

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type SetStateAction<T extends State> = T | ((oldState: T) => T | Promise<T>);
```
<b>References:</b> [State](./js.state.md)
